alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Lexington; Newberry; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Fairfield, southeastern Newberry, central Lexington, Richland and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 828 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elgin to 6 miles southwest of Jenkinsville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Arcadia Lakes, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Sesquicentennial State Park and Lake Carolina. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 56 and 90. Interstate 26 between mile markers 87 and 120. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
